entry.title: Weekend Linkfest 9.11.2013
entry.content:
I successfully defended my master thesis this week, so I was too busy to post linkfests in the meantime. But now I am back! I have also released my first package on CRAN: parboost. Expect more on \texttt{parboost} in another post.

Statistics and Machine Learning

  • Growing Randomized Trees in the Cloud
  • Example Python Machine Learning Algorithm on Spark
  • Literate Testing in R
  • CS281: Advanced Machine Learning
  • How Do You Write Your Model Definitions?
  • Free Book: Theory and Applications for Advanced Text Mining
  • Mahout - Future Directions
  • Got a Minute? Spin up a Spark cluster on your laptop with Docker
  • Vowpal Wabbit on Elastic MapReduce
  • Machine Learning with Apache Mahout: The Lay of the Land
  • GraphLab Notebook | GraphLab
  • accidental aRt
  • Doing Bayesian Data Analysis: Diagrams for hierarchical models: New drawing tools
  • The Gigaom guide to deep learning: Who’s doing it, and why it matters
  • 24 beautifully-designed web dashboards that data geeks will love

R Package of the Week

  • The arules R-Package Ecosystem: Analyzing Interesting Patterns from Large Transaction Data Sets

Paper(s) of the Week

  • The SHOGUN Machine Learning Toolbox
  • Parallel Algorithm for Learning Optimal Bayesian Network Structure
  • Hash Kernels for Structured Data
  • Analysis of Random Forest Model
  • Random Search for Hyper-Parameter Optimization

Programming

  • Julia’s Role in Data Science
  • So You’d Like To Make a Map Using Python
  • Towards Responsiveness with d3chartjs
  • IHaskell: Haskell for IPython
  • Learn Haskell Fast and Hard
  • Cassandra vs MongoDB vs CouchDB vs Redis vs Riak vs HBase vs Couchbase vs Hypertable vs ElasticSearch vs Accumulo vs VoltDB vs Scalaris comparison
  • aRrgh: a newcomer’s (angry) guide to data types in R
  • Git Tutorials and Training
  • Memory usage in R
  • Amazon EC2 Instance Comparison
  • Interview: Bjarne Stroustrup Discusses C++
